analyze_property.name: metric
analyze_property.description:
Evaluation metric used for the analysis. If not specified, the default one is used.
(default is None)

analyze_property.name: split_by
analyze_property.description:
If there are too many values, the plot is divided into subplots. The split can be performed by 'categories' or by 'meta-annotations'.
(default is 'meta-annotations')

analyze_property.name: sort
analyze_property.description:
Indicates whether the property values should be sorted by the score achieved. Not supported for models comparisons.
(default is True)

show_confusion_matrix.name: properties_values
show_confusion_matrix.description:
Properties values to be considered in te analysis. If not specified, all the values are considered.
(default is None)
The index of the properties values must be the same of the properties names. Example:
properties_names=['name1', 'name2']
properties_values=[['value1_of_name1', 'value2_of_name1'], ['value1_of_name2']]

evaluation_metric.name: gt
evaluation_metric.description:
For classification tasks, it is a list representing the ground truth categories.
For localization tasks, it is a pandas.DataFrame representing the ground truth.

evaluation_metric.name: detections
evaluation_metric.description:
For classification tasks, it is a list representing the predictions scores.
For localization tasks, it is a pandas.DataFrame representing the predictions.

evaluation_metric.name: matching
evaluation_metric.description:
For classification tasks, it is None.
For localization tasks, it represents the matching between the ground truth and the proposals. For each matching row, the following fields can be accessed:
confidence (prediction confidence value)
difficult (if it is difficult to predict the annotation)
iou (intersection over union value)
det_id (id of the detection)
ann_id (id of the annotation)
category_det (id of the category predicted)
category_ann (id of the ground truth category)

evaluation_metric.name: is_micro_required
evaluation_metric.description:
Indicates whether the gt and detections represent a single category.
(default is False)

(default is None)

visualize_annotations.description:

visualize_annotations_for_error_type.description: Error type to be included in the analysis. The types of error supported are: ErrorType.BACKGROUND, ErrorType.LOCALIZATION (only for localization tasks), ErrorType.SIMILAR_CLASSES, ErrorType.OTHER.

visualize_annotations_for_error_type.name: categories
visualize_annotations_for_error_type.description:
List of categories to be included in the visualization. If not specified, all the categories are included.

visualize_annotations_for_error_type.description:

(default is None)

visualize_cams.description:
List of CAMs categories to be included in the visualization. If not specified, all the categories are included.
(default is None)

visualize_cams.name: heatmap
visualize_cams.description:
Indicates whether to visualize the CAMs in heatmap mode or not.
(default is True)

visualize_cams.name: threshold
visualize_cams.description:
Threshold used for the CAMs visualization.
(default is 0.5)

visualize_cams.name: show_predictions
visualize_cams.description:
Indicates whether to visualize also the predictions.
(default is False)

visualize_cams.name: show_only_gt_cams
visualize_cams.description:
If cams_categories is not specified, indicates whether to show all the CAMs or only the ones related to the ground truth labels.
(default is False)

visualize_cams.name: model
visualize_cams.description:
Name of the model used for the visualization. If not specified, it is considered the first provided.
(default is None)
